verses.roman:
darśana kari' ṭhākura-pāśa ājñā māgilā
pūjārī prabhure mālā-prasāda āni' dilā

synonyms: darśana kari'-visiting the Lord; ṭhākura-pāśa—from the Lord; ājñā māgilā—begged permission; pūjārī—the priest; prabhure—unto Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mālā—garland; prasāda—remnants of food; āni'-bringing; dilā—delivered.
translation: Seeing Lord Jagannātha, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu also begged His permission. The priest then immediately delivered prasāda and a garland to Lord Caitanya.
